Clib:

A button started to blink and a sound to heard, whoever was made 
Elita Clib, it seem that it was link to his father system, in that 
way that he could knew whatever was happening inside the Crib.



-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil nearly jumped at the mention of the legendary name.
> 
> Yggdrasil: The Ark?!? It's here?!?!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > Rodimus Prime: The problem is that our spy to get Nightlight, is
> already in their base.
> > 
> > Kup comes running in.
> > 
> > Kup: Roddy, Yggdrasil, my security systems just gave an alarming
> situation. I got Predacon signatures... at the Ark!
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil: Spy on her first. In 
the
> Iron Squad, we use a special
> > "mole" device that slowly analyzes a bot. If you manage to snipe 
it on
> > her, she'll be tagged and we'll know anything we want to.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus Prime: How are we supposed to do that? If we wait to 
capture
> > Nightlight we may not be able to make the clone fast enough to 
replace
> > her without the Preds knowing.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil did a quick check of 
the
> > data he had "captured" and nodded
> > > with a surprised expression.
> > > 
> > > Yggdrasil: Oh yes, yes! That's even more than enough! It's as 
like the
> > > consciousness of Nightlight's program is willing to work with 
us...
> > > But for more credibility, I think we'll have to look at the 
First
> > > Nightlight so we know how to make this clone and how she'll 
have to
> > > behave under her Pred disguise.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime : : The Maximal Commander came back online from 
sleep
> > > mode. Yggdrasil's computer had gotton all of Nightlight's 
programming
> > > from his spark. Rodimus Prime: Will that do, Yggdrasil? 
> > >
